channel.description: CC 410 - Week 7 This Week Parallel Programming Parallel Example Event-Driven Programming Event Driven Example Restaurant Milestone 5 Milestone 5 GUI Events Refine GUI Structure - Tree Add Button Click Handlers (Mostly) Functional GUI Some Unit Tests Read the Hints! Testing Issues Limited Memory (512 MB) Java: gradle --stop Project -> Restart Box Refresh Browser Python: run tests in batches Looking Ahead Module 8 - Design Patterns & Combos Module 9 - External Libraries Module 10 - Releases Week 9 & 10 - Same Milestone Web APIs, etc.
